text: Abdul Mateen Chowdhury (1895-1948) was a lawyer and Bengali political leader, who was active in the All India Muslim Leagues Pakistan Movement. He died in 1948 in Karachi, Pakistan, a year after the achievement of Pakistan. Category:1895 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Politicians from Karachi Category:Leaders of All India Muslim League
title: Abdul Matin Chowdhury
